arts.ttl: Jackson brace ensures rotated Bayern crush Leverkusen's feeble resistance
arts.sum: Tonight's Top Spiel was something of a damp squib as a Bayern Munich side sporting wholesale changes ripped Bayer Leverkusen apart at the Allianz Arena.

arts.ttl: Bayern Munich vs Bayer Leverkusen – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Bayern Munich welcome Bayer Leverkusen to the Allianz Arena on Saturday as the defending Bundesliga champions look to maintain their perfect start to the season. The Bavarians have won all 14 competitive matches and are five points clear at the top of the league, whilst the visitors are building momentum under new manager Kasper Hjulmand. arts.ttl: "No silly fouls!" – Kompany wary of Grimaldo's free-kick threat
arts.sum: Ahead of Bayern’s clash with Bayer Leverkusen, coach Vincent Kompany commented on the significant free-kick threat posed by Alex Grimaldo.
